mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member(mbid, mbpw, mbname) VALUES(#{mbId}, #{mbPw}, #{mbName})
mapper.update: UPDATE member SET mbpw = #{mbPw}, mbname = #{mbName} where mbid = #{mbId}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM MEMBER WHERE mbid = #{mbId} AND mbpw = #{mbPw}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBER WHERE mbid = #{mbId}
